show.title: Chottanikkarai Marmam
show.description: Peigal, Arakkargal, Yakshigal nu neraya amanushya sakthigal Chottanikkaarai gramatha attack pannudhunga üíÄüëπ. Makkala antha theeya sakthigaltta irundhu kaappatha Devi apdingra Chinna Ponnu mun Varaa.. . Ava Yaaru? Amaanushyangala Edhirthu Poraadra Sakthi avalukku Eppadi Kedachadhu? üî±üî• Ava Eppadi antha Peigala Vettaiyaada Poraa..?  Vaanga Kekkalaam. Chottanikkarai Marmam - Idhu Marmangal Niraindha amanushya Thigil Kathai.üëßü¶Å‚öîÔ∏è
